channel.title: Keeps resulting in 2147m

item.title: Keeps resulting in 2147m
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Argghhhh I’m trying to get this damn fletching thing down, but my only problem now is when you’re fletching headless_arrows or arrows. When you have let’s say 5 shafts and 10 feathers then use them together you make 2147m headless arrows, same goes for headless arrows and arrow tips. Here’s my code: // if(type > 0){ if(hasItems(HEADLESS_ARROW, currentItem) && player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW) >= 15 && player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) >= 15 && type == 2){ player.getInventory().deleteItem(HEADLESS_ARROW, 15); player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, 15); player.getInventory().addItem(id, 15); } else if(hasItems(HEADLESS_ARROW, currentItem) && player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW) < 15 && type == 2){ if(player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW) <= player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) && (player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) != 0 && player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW) != 0)){ player.getInventory().deleteItem(HEADLESS_ARROW, player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW)); player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW)); player.getInventory().addItem(id, player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW)); } else if(player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) <= player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW) && (player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) != 0 && player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW) != 0)){ player.getInventory().deleteItem(HEADLESS_ARROW, player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem)); player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem)); player.getInventory().addItem(id, player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem)); } } else if(hasItems(SHAFT, currentItem) && player.getInventory().numberOf(SHAFT) >= 15 && player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) >= 15 && type == 4){ player.getInventory().deleteItem(SHAFT, 15); player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, 15); player.getInventory().addItem(id, 15); } else if(hasItems(SHAFT, currentItem) && player.getInventory().numberOf(SHAFT) < 15 && type == 4){ if(player.getInventory().numberOf(SHAFT) <= player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) && (player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) != 0 && player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW) != 0)){ player.getInventory().deleteItem(SHAFT, player.getInventory().numberOf(SHAFT)); player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, player.getInventory().numberOf(SHAFT)); player.getInventory().addItem(id, player.getInventory().numberOf(SHAFT)); } else if(player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) <= player.getInventory().numberOf(SHAFT) && (player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem) != 0 && player.getInventory().numberOf(HEADLESS_ARROW) != 0)){ player.getInventory().deleteItem(SHAFT, player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem)); player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem)); player.getInventory().addItem(id, player.getInventory().numberOf(currentItem)); } } else if(hasItems(BOW_STRING, currentItem) && type == 1){ player.getInventory().deleteItem(BOW_STRING, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(id, 1); } else if(id == 52){ player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(id, 15); //} } else { player.getInventory().deleteItem(currentItem, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(id, 1); }
There has to be something I can do to fix it. Any help would be much appreciated.
